Package de.lases.persistence.repository

Class ReviewedByRepository

java.lang.Object
de.lases.persistence.repository.ReviewedByRepository
public class ReviewedByRepository extends Object
Offers get/change operations on the relationship between reviewer and submission.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static ReviewedBy get​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Returns the ReviewedBy dto for the given submission and user.
      Parameters:
      submission - A submission dto with a valid id.
      user - A user dto with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled ReviewedBy dto for the specified submission and user. Returns null if there is no such relationship.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id, there is no user with the provided id or there is no
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • change

      public static void change​(ReviewedBy reviewedBy, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Changes the given ReviewedBy in the repository.
      Parameters:
      reviewedBy - A fully filled ReviewedBy dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no reviewedBy relationship with the given user id and submission id.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the provided ReviewedBy dto is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
